connect.title: First Thursday Book Club
connect.detailedLocation: 918 SW Yamhill Street, 4th Floor, Portland, OR
connect.description: Joseph Wachunas will resume meetings of the First Thursday Book Club (FTBC) in February. This particular meetup is best suited for adults with an Intermediate to advanced level knowledge of the Italian language.
Joseph Wachunas will resume meetings of the First Thursday Book Club (FTBC) in February.

connect.title: PUBLIC EVENT: Food as Medicine Fourth Annual Symposium
connect.description: Interested in fermentation, urban farming or the beauty of embracing food as medicine? Join us for this one day event with our special guest speakers.

connect.title: Urbanism in the Age of Climate Change
connect.description: This provocative and engaging work emerges from Calthorpe’s belief that, just as the last fifty years produced massive changes in our culture, economy and environment, the next fifty will generate changes of an even more profound nature.

volunteer.title: Volunteering with Free Geek
volunteer.description: Free Geek and PDXWIT are partnering up for our first group volunteer activity. Dani Schulte will be teaching volunteers how to manually disassemble computers, peripheral electronic devices, and other electronic hardware.

volunteer.title: Jump into Fundraising!
volunteer.description: Adelante Mujeres is seeking a part time volunteer to serve as support for Adelante Mujeres' annual fundraiser, Fiesta of Hope.

volunteer.title: Willamette Rotaract
volunteer.description: It's time to celebrate another successful year! Join the luau and help welcome the 2016/2017 Willamette Rotaract board and thank the 2015/2016 board for all their hard work.

issue.description: President Trump closed the nation’s borders to refugees from around the world, ordering that families fleeing the slaughter in Syria be indefinitely blocked from entering the United States. The order stops the admission of refugees from Syria indefinitely, and bars entry into the United States for 90 days from seven predominantly Muslim countries linked to concerns about terrorism. Those countries are Iraq, Syria, Iran, Sudan, Libya, Somalia and Yemen.
issue.name: steve
issue.title: captain
